High Rewards Loyalty Program

Discover & experience a whole new hospitality experience through our member benefits.

Join Today

Free Membership!

Already a member? Log in now

to see how many points you have and to make the most of your benefits

As soon as you enter the Hotel Indonesia Group loyalty programme, we are there to offer exclusive services and special attention during your entire stay. Whether on holiday or travelling for business, we do everything we can to meet your needs and make your trips as pleasant as possible.

How is Your Status Determined?

On joining the programme, you will be automatically awarded HIGH Rewards Blue status

You progress to the next Status level by completing stays at hotels that have enrolled to participate in the Hotel Indonesia group programme

You unlock new benefits each time you progress to a new Status level

The Main Benefits Associated with Each Status

HIGH Rewards

Now by just making a booking through our website at hotelindonesiagroup.co.id, you will get points and enjoy attractive choices from what we provide. Many choices of benefits, ranging from discounts, special offers to free nights and other convenience services.

There are 4 status on HIGH Rewards:

  • HIGH Rewards Blue
  • HIGH Rewards Silver
  • HIGH Rewards Gold
  • HIGH Rewards Platinum

HIGH Privilege

By being HIGH Privilege member, we invite you to enjoy a fast track to our HIGH Rewards Gold Status. Therefore you are always be welcome with privilege benefits such as Late Check-Out, Room Upgrade to the next room type and many others benefits, simply by presenting your membership card upon check-in.

  • HIGH Privilege Blue
  • HIGH Privilege Silver
  • HIGH Privilege Gold
  • HIGH Privilege Platinum

HIGH Pro

The offer is integrally part of the HIGH Rewards programme. Meeting Planner members will receive a HIGH Pro card.
